Language.name: English
Language.String: All newly trained units will move to this location when training is completed. You can set a Base Rally Point to direct a specific base's units someplace else.
A new support power is available to select
Repair or reinforce the selected units
Tell any units you have garrisoned in this cover object to get out and return to normal combat mode.
Units train as normal, but are garrisoned inside the base instead of exiting into the world. UNLOCK will release all the garrisoned units at once.
Release any garrisoned units and return base training to normal.
New units from this base will move to this location when training is complete. Use the Global Rally Point to override this behavior.
Instantly destroy this entire base to free it up for an ally.
Upgrades base to a Combat Station, which adds two more building sites. Each building adds to the strength of the central structure.
Upgrades base to a Command Center, which adds two more building sites. Each building adds to the strength of the central structure.
Supply production massively increased for this Supply Pad.
This Reactor provides a higher rate of energy.
Adds a light auto-cannon to all Elephants. This turret is only operable when the Elephant is deployed.
Marines can now use the grenade ability to decimate targets.
Marines squads are joined by a rocket launcher-toting Engineer who can repair allied vehicles.
Dramatically increases Warthog armour, turning into a light tank. PLACEHOLDER
Adds a Marine armed with a Grenade Launcher to improve attack strength.
Improves Wolverine damage and defense (for now).
Enables the active Volley Ability on Wolverines. The Volley Ability can be used to deal big damage to any ground target.
Improves Scorpion damage and defense (for now).
Equips Scorpions with a secondary Canister Shell attack. This attack is devastating to any infantry in its blast area.
Adds a couple of Marines riding shotgun to augment damage capabilities.
Adds a Combat Medic to the squad. The Medic heals the squad after combat.
Improves Cobra damage and defense (for now).
Hardened steel plates give the Cobra extra protection when locked down.
Increases the attack and defense of your Leader.
Upgrades all Turrets to Medium Turrets, increasing their hitpoints and damage.
Upgrades all Turrets to Large Turrets, increasing their hitpoints and damage.
Upgrades all Turrets to Medium Turrets, increasing their hitpoints and damage.
Upgrades all Turrets to Large Turrets, increasing their hitpoints and damage.
Upgrades base to a Keep, which adds two building sites.
Upgrades base to a Citadel, which adds two building sites.
Grunt squads have one addtional Grunt.
Grunt squads are now equipped with needlers.
Adds extra shielding to deflect incoming projectiles.
Equips each Hunter with a huge shield that can deflect many projectiles.
Hunters get a big damage boost while both bond brothers are alive.
Enables the Boosted Ram Ability on Ghosts, allowing them to effectively ram their targets.
Allows Ghosts to more effectively dodge incoming grenades and rockets.
Adds a Plasma Torpedo weapon to the Banshee.
Increases the rate of fire for the Banshee's weapons.
Stasis Ability now drains target hitpoints and heals the Vampire.
Adds an energy shield that deflects some incoming damage.
Enables the Scorch Ability that superheats an area of terrain for extra damage.
Booster shots enable all infantry units to run at significantly increased speeds.
Upgrades Warthog machine gun to a gauss cannon. Improves damage and defense.
An extra rocket pod gives Wolverines considerably more damage potential.
Doubles the rotation speed for Scorpion turrets, making them considerably more responsive in combat.
Hornets gain the passive Chaff Ability that is used to distract and divert incoming missiles.
Cobra railguns gain extra power to allow them to punch through multiple targets, inflicting damage on each.
Modifies Turret into an anti-infantry shade Turret.
Modifies Turret into an anti-air heavy needler Turret.
Modifies Turret into an anti-ground vehicle Turret.

Enables the Locust Overdrive Ability. This ability uses the Locust's shield generator output to overcharge its beam weapon. Attack power is drastically increased at the expense of the Locust's shields.
Inspires the Grunt squad, improving their combat abilities.
Upgrade the production capacity of this Harvester to produce more supplies.
Increases the attack and defense of your Leader.
Increases the attack and defense of your Leader.
Converts Turret to an Anti-Infantry Turret.
Converts Turret to an Anti-Vehicle Turret.
Converts Turret to an Anti-Air Turret
Adds +10 to the population cap of your army.
Adds front-firing 35mm guns, improving the Chopper's attack.
Upgrades all Choppers to be Marauders - heavily armoured light tank. PLACEHOLDER
Enables the Jump Pack Ability, allowing Brutes to quickly cross the battlefield.
Increases the maximum size of your army by 10.
Upgrade the Power Extractor to an AUGMENTED Power Extractor to increase you power income rate.
Marines are the main UNSC infantry unit. They are good against most everything. They have an active Grenade Ability that can eventually be upgraded to an active Rocket Ability.
Mainline troop, slow and short range, yet still the best returns per cost in combat.
ODSTs are an elite version of UNSC Marines. They excel at everything a Marine is good at, but can also be hot-dropped anywhere on the battlefield from Spirit of Fire.

Prototype UNSC super soldiers, the Spartans possess extreme combat skills. Spartans have an active ability to Jack enemy vehicles and Commandeer friendly vehicles. This boosts the combat power of those vehicles.
Warthogs are the UNSC's fast scout units. They start with an active Ram Ability, but can be upgraded to get various guns for extra attack power.
Scorpions are the main UNSC vehicle. They can stand toe-to-toe with the toughest enemies, but are mobile enough to get where they're needed quickly.
Anti-air missile pods cover the UNSC Wolverine's shell. Devastatingly effective against air units, Wolverines can also unleash a fusillade of rockets against buildings.
The Plasma Rhino is a secret UNSC weapon just now entering field tests. Unpacking the Rhino turns it into a long-range artillery unit that fires heated plasma, decimating anything it hits.
Mainline air unit, the Hawk is a sophisticated laser-armed attack craft.
Vultures are the most advanced UNSC war machine. Costly to produce, the Vultures dish out damage at an alarming rate.
Mainline troop, slow and short range yet still the best returns per cost in combat.
Specialty troops, wielding energy swords and using cloaks these units are best tearing infantry apart from surprise.

These fearsome warriors are equipped with jump packs that enable them to leap high into the air before landing and delivering a pounding hammer attack - excellent for hit and run harassment tactics or quickly getting within melee range of enemy targets.
Counter-infantry unit, often armed with sniper rifles, Elite Rangers can make quick work of enemy infantry.
Counter-vehicle unit, powerful fuel rod cannons are a credible threat even against tanks.
Leader of the Covenant forces, the Arbiter is equipped with dual plasma swords for uber-melee death.
Mainline battle tank, good speed and excellent range combine to make this a powerful ground vehicle.
The Covenant Super Unit. These massive assault vehicles have a devastating beam that can tear apart virtually anything.
Mainline air unit, Banshees are armed with both plasma cannons and fuel rod cannons.
Counter-air aircraft, heavy needler turret can track and engage enemy air in a large area.
Pyromaniacs to the core, UNSC Hellbringers burn up any organic thing they can find. They excel at killing all infantry units.
Counter-building vehicle, very slow and best set to destroying unprotected enemy bases.

The UNSC Cobra is an incredibly effective anti-vehicle threat. It's fast and agile against vehicles, but also has an active Unpack Ability that turns the Cobra into a long-range artillery unit that is excellent against buildings.

Honor Guard are very fast moving melee assault units equipped with a personal energy shield that recharges when not in combat. Their cloaking ability allows them to sneak up on unsuspecting target where they can perform a devastating thrusting attack with their plasma swords.
The UNSC Grizzly is a beefed-up version of the Scorpion. The Grizzly is even better at killing everything than the Scorpion, and starts with dual cannons and the ability to fire canister shells.
Heal any units and repair any buildings in an area.
Use the UNSC Shortsword Bomber to drop Cryo Bombs in an area, freezing all things for a short time.
Use the UNSC Shortsword Bomber to drop a high number of anti-infantry mines in an area.
Use the UNSC Shortsword Bomber to devastate a strip of land with massive bombs.
Disrupts existing Leader Powers and prevents new Leader Powers from being initiated in a small area for 1 minute.
Call in Pelicans to transport a small group of units from one place to another.
Drops an ODST squad at target location.
Drops a turret at target location.
Call in Pelicans to transport a small group of units from one place to another.
Use Spirit of Fire's awesome Mass Accelerated Cannons to incinerate enemy troops.
Select an area to bomb with a shortsword bomber.
Although they cannot be fired near enemy Jammers, tactical missiles can be devastating against enemy troops and buildings.
Select an area for the Mega Turret to fire on.
Select a location to lay a minefield.
Rhino locks down increasing range and damage.
Long-range beam attack that does bonus damage against buildings.
Unique Unit: ELEPHANT, Leader Power: MAC Blast, Super Unit: ODST, Bonus: All bases start at 1 higher tech level.
Unique Unit: CYCLOPS, Leader Power: Carpet Bomb, Super Unit: GRIZZLY, Bonus: Builds Heavy Supply Pads right away.
Unique Unit: GREMLIN, Leader Power: Cryo Bomb, Super Unit: HAWK, Bonus: All unit upgrades are half-price and research in half the time.
Unique Unit: SUICIDE GRUNT, Leader Power: Rage
Unique Unit: BRUTE, BRUTE CHOPPER, Leader Power: Vortex
Unique Unit: ELITE HONOR GUARD, Leader Power: Cleansing
Basic unsc with no leader bonuses. *for testing purposes only*
Basic covenant with no leader bonuses. *for testing purposes only*
You can request to have a small base dropped in from orbit. Eventually, you can expand that into a full base.
All new units will move to this location when their training is complete. The Global Rally Point overrides existing Base Rally Points.
UNSC Reactors provide a Power income, building additional Bases lets you build more Reactors.
The Covenant Harvester produces the resources needed to train units, build buildings, and buy technology upgrades. Bases that have great economic production might have 6 Harvesters.
The UNSC Supply Pad produces the resources needed to train units, build buildings, and buy technology upgrades. Bases that have great economic production might have 6 Supply Pads.

The UNSC Heavy Supply Pad produces extra resources (compared to the default Supply Pad) needed to train units, build buildings, and buy technology upgrades. Bases that have great economic production might have 6 Supply Pads.

UNSC Advanced Reactors provide twice as much energy (compared to default Reactors) needed to access advanced buildings, units and technology upgrades. High-tech bases may have as many as 4 or 5 Reactors.
The UNSC Armory is an experimental and high-tech laboratory. Special units like Spartans, ONI Operatives and Condors can be trained here.
The Barracks trains the bulk of the UNSC infantry units. Infantry technology upgrades can also be found here.
The UNSC Garage constructs the ground vehicles for the UNSC army. Vehicle technology upgrades can also be found here.
The Air Pad creates the various UNSC air units. Air unit technology upgrades can also be found here.
Use this to construct a new Outpost Base. Eventually, it can be upgraded to a full Citadel, increasing your ability to crush the evil enemy filth.
Covenant aircraft are constructed at the Apex. Aircraft upgrades are also in this structure.
Specializes in infantry units and upgrades. Once Tier II is reached it can produce Carbine Elites, Hunters and Tier III unlocks further infantry upgrades.
Most Covenant vehicles are pieced together and upgraded at the Foundry.

These stealthy Elites are permanently cloaked from enemy units and carry surveillance drones which can be placed at a location to scan the area and temporarily lift the localized fog of war around it.
Air unit with a standard Forerunner beam weapon
Generates a large bubble shield to protect the base. Multiple Shield Generators can be built in a base to compound the shield's strength.
Use the building sites to build Extractors and Turrets
Use the building sites to build Energy Extractors and Turrets
Use the building sites to build Energy Extractors and Turrets
Use the building sites to build Supply Extractors and Turrets
Use the building sites to build Supply Extractors and Turrets
Use infantry to capture this site which can be used to produce supplies
Use infantry to capture this site which can be used to produce power
Attack this site to force it back to neutral
Build Warthogs and unlocks Depot and Com Tower
Build Nightingales and Operatives, upgrades to Air Pad
Build Spartans, Vultures and upgrades to a Battle Lab
Build Unggoy Spec Ops. Unlocks Factory and Peak
Build Wraiths and Gorgons. Upgrade to Supreme Fabricator
Build Banshee and Shroud. Upgrade to Spire
Build Elite Honour Guard. Upgrade to Greater Temple
Build Elite Honour Guard and Scarab
Power Extractors increase your power income rate and can be upgraded to an Advanced Power Extractor.
The Watchtower increases the visual range of a Base. Can upgraded to detect stealth units.
Use Marines to Destroy Barrier Power Source
Hornets are the main UNSC air unit. They come armed with Gatling cannons and explosive rockets giving them more than adequate offense against most any enemy.
Protect Civilians and Cargo Transports until Launch
The downtown subway exit is under attack. We need to hold that area!
Cargo ONE is not responding. Transport assumed lost. Focus all attention on Cargo TWO
Cargo TWO is down. Cargo ONE MUST SURVIVE!
Get Bravo Platoon to the Landing Zone
Spirit of Fire's ground forces are scattered and disorganized. Covering their retreat and evacuation is the highest priority.
Spirit of Fire is being drawn against her will into the belly of a hostile planet. Ground forces deployed to the planet's surface will be abandoned if Spirit of Fire doesn't act quickly...
Get Alpha Platoon to the Landing Zone
Use an Elephant to Tow the Core up to the Apex Base Site
Build and Attach Elephant to FTL Reactor Core
Optional: Take Control of the Scarab
So. What? No 'thanks for rescuing me, Sergeant?'
Later! The Covenant are assembling a huge fleet!
Suddenly this LZ doesn't look so good. Spirit, we're gonna need back up.
Let's get out of here. I saw a teleporter over there!
Spirit of Fire, we are ready for transport. Anders, stay by that beacon.
Get a Rhino to the Marked Position
Get the Rhino to the First Position
Place a Rhino at the Marked 2nd Position
Transport a Rhino to the Marked 3rd Position
Get Rhinos to the Last Two Marked Positions
Spartan Red Team reporting in. Sergeant, we will flank the enemy and move to your location.
Spartan Red Team reporting in. Where do you want us, Sergeant?
Optional: Find and Rescue Pinned Marines
Defend the Crater until Omega Team Arrives
Fast-paced gameplay where taking the high ground may be the difference between life and death.
Bases in this region tend to have two ways in and out. Controlling the center may lead to a larger-than-normal population limit.
Battle inside the Relic, the side that comes out on top will control the Artifact below.
Fast-paced gameplay where taking the high ground may be the difference between life and death.
A frozen pond and several craters channel troop movements into killing zones in this battle-scarred region.
Large bodies of water leave narrow choke points between you and your enemies.
Barren lands leave few natural defenses for your base and there is a node with many sockets located in the center.
Upgrades the Cyclops with Shock Rounds, which slow vehicles on impact
Equips each Cyclops with tools to heal mechanized units and buildings.
Massively improved mobility systems increases movement speed of each Cyclops.
Battle from platform to platform traversing space via your transport power while losing air superiority may cost you the war.
Increases damage inflicted when the Chopper runs over enemies, and decreases the damage taken.
Jackal shields do not collapse when taking damage.
Equips Hunters with a devastating beam-based weapon.
Adds an energy shield to Ghosts that deflects some incoming damage.
Banshees attempt to crash into ground targets and inflict area damage when destroyed.
When a target is drained with the Stasis Ability, it explodes, doing area-effect damage.
Greatly increases the damage of the Wraith's Plasma Mortar.
Small AOE damage on each round of the BruteChopper
Locust shields regenerate much more quickly.
Improves flying artillery damage and defense
Adds another Brute to the pack for more mayhem
The Brute hammers do more damage.
Fight your Way to Forge and Anders' Location
Increases energy rate at all Monuments.
Increases energy rate at all Monuments.
Increases energy rate at all Monuments.
Bases in this region must be heavily defended at night, when Flood Swarms emerge from their hiding places.
Enemies might be hiding around every corner on this map where large Forerunner structures dominate the landscape
Hellbringers gain a massive increase of damage against Buildings.
Slow-burning, sticky napalm burns enemies for several seconds after the initial attack.
An advanced, higher burn point fuel increases damage to all organic units.
Improves building armor and defensive Turret damage
Improves building armor and defensive Turret damage
Improves building armor and defensive Turret damage
Improves infantry damage by cannons fired by Scorpions, Hawks, Badger teams,and Cannon Turrets.
Improves vehicle damage by Cannons fired by Scorpions, Hawks, Badger teams,and Cannon Turrets.
Further reduces market and tribute penalty
Increases Energy production by 1/3 but decreases supplies production by 1/3
Machine gun bullets increased damage against aircraft
Adds a personal shield that decreases incoming damage.
Equips Spartans with two-handed auto-guns for dramatically increased damage.
Improved reflexes allow Spartans to Jack enemy vehicles much more effectively.
The ultimate UNSC handheld weapon gives Spartans a distinct combat advantage.
Extractors and turrets can be built here.
Only Extractors can be built here.
A new base is cleared for placement here
Recycle this building and return some supplies back to your bank.
Add shields to all buildings and upgrades Turret damage.
Add shields to all buildings and upgrades Turret damage.
Add shields to all buildings and upgrades Turret damage.
Shields regen faster and sooner after combat ends.
Shields regen faster and sooner after combat ends.
Shields regen faster and sooner after combat ends.
Increases the shields that captured nodes have when upgraded.
Increases the shields that captured nodes have when upgraded.
Further reduces market and tribute penalty
Adds bonus Anti-Infantry attack to the Turret.
Adds bonus Anti-Vehicle attack to the Turret.
Adds bonus Anti-Air attack to the Turret.
Elephant speed is greatly improved by the addition of a second engine.
An additional set of composite alloy plates boost the Elephant's damage mediation.
Battle over a node heavy center; although you can gain a major econ boost, you can not build Turrets there.
Sergeant, we have to stop the Covenant...
John, I... I think I know how to stop the Covenant! I need to get to my lab!
Baby steps, Professor. Let's try not dying first.
Finally! Sergeant, I need you to stay down here and get this area locked down.
Well, whaddya know? Locked down is my specialty.
Well, lookee there. The Covenant abandoned a Scarab. Wonder if they left the keys in it?
You know, they really shouldn't leave their toys lying around.
Help text stand-in for Mega Turret.
Hold off the Flood until your men can evac.
Doubles the number of missiles in each salvo of the active Barrage Ability.
Urban warfare on a galactic scale; controlling the center paths may be difficult since you cannot build on top of them.
War has left very few structures intact on this piece of rock, but its still our rock...
Battle around hot geysers on barren Harvest.
Player can build a second Scarab.
Brute Choppers and Brute Tanks have increased trample damage *not active atm*
Brutes, Brute Choppers, and Brute Tanks train faster
Brutes, Brute Choppers, and Brute Tanks are cheaper
Brutes, Brute Choppers and Brute Tanks deal more damage against buildings.

Leader of the Covenant forces, the Prophet of Regret also brings unique combat abilities to the battlefield. In addition to his combat strength, he can call down the Cleansing Power to incinerate his enemies.
Sergeant Forge must try to help scattered groups of pinned-down soldiers and retake Alpha Base.
With the area around Alpha Base secure, the base must be brought back online. Military units must then be trained and sent to investigate the relic.
Anders and Forge have been cut off inside the structure. They must be rescued.
The Covenant has attacked Arcadia in force, and the civilian population is evacuating. Spirit of Fire's ground troops will provide cover.
Covenant forces have overrun the city. Spirit of Fire's troops must fall back and hold a defensive position until Omega Team arrives.
The Covenant have constructed a large energy dome on Arcadia. Enemy forces must be defeated and the dome destroyed.
The dome was protecting a Covenant super weapon. Ground units must be sent in to finish the job.
Readings from the planet's surface are highly unusual. The advance forces must be covered and protected while they investigate.
Anders' transponder signal has been detected. She must be found and rescued before it is too late.
Get Charlie Platoon to the Landing Zone
Mysterious alien infection forms threaten Spirit of Fire. They must be cleansed from the ship's hull before they penetrate the interior.
A Covenant destroyer has sideswiped Spirit of Fire. The ship must be repaired and Covenant forces must be driven back.
It is vital that Anders returns to Spirit of Fire. She must be protected and escorted to the LZ.
The shield world must not fall into Covenant hands. Spirit's reactor core has been removed and will be used to destroy the entire facility.
The reactor core must be brought to the Apex. At the same time, a way for Spirit of Fire to escape must be found.
Forge rallies the troops and retakes Alpha Base
Get Alpha Base up and running and find out what the Covenant were up to.
Forge and Anders are trapped inside the relic. They must be rescued.
The Covenant invasion of Arcadia is in full swing. Evacuation of its civilian population is the UNSC's top priority.
The civilian evacuation is complete. UNSC forces must safely withdraw from the city.
Uncover what the Covenant were after on Arcadia.
Send in ground units to destroy a Covenant super weapon.
Forge and Recon Groups ECHO and INDIA start the search for Anders.
Find Anders and rescue her before it is too late.
Cleanse the infection forms from Spirit's hull before they penetrate the interior.
Repair Spirit of Fire and drive Covenant forces back.
Protect Anders and escort her to the LZ.
Pull the reactor core to the Apex site.
Help Spirit of Fire's crew escape from the Shield World.
If we can hold them at this river, maybe we can keep them out of the city.
Frozen tundra leave few natural defenses for your base, but that means few for your enemies as well.
Destroy the Covenant Base and its Guards
Three platoons inbound. Designating them Alpha, Bravo and Charlie.
They're with Charlie, sir... that could be a problem.
We can't evac those trapped Marines until the air is clear. Let's be about it, people.
Sorry, I can't help you right now.
Give me a minute then I will help you.
Look what the enemy is doing... there.
Can you help me defend... here?
Can you help me attack... here?
I want to claim this node.
I am going to try to boom (focus on resources and upgrades).
I am going to try to turtle (focus on defenses).
I am going to try to rush (focus on military).
I am going to kick your ass with vehicles.
I am going to kick your ass with infantry.
I am going to kick your ass with air.
Alpha Base, this is Bravo 29 heavy inbound. I've got the professor aboard.
Alpha Base, this is Bravo 29. I can drop reinforcements at that landing pad if you can remove all hostiles in that area for me.
Take cover in those downed Pelicans! Move!
We must take the relic in one piece. Let's regroup and start over.
Covenant energy barriers can be taken down by destroying their power source.
I'm picking up lots of Covenant chatter around your position - looks like they are setting up defenses.
If the Covenant detonate those explosives our mission here is over. Get to the detonator!
Good work. Prepare for new orders.
Serina, see if you can buy us more time. Sergeant, break through that line for our Pelicans.
This is Alpha Platoon - we've got hostile contacts. LOTS of hostile contacts.
This is Alpha Platoon - we can't hold our position much longer.
This is Alpha Platoon! We're being overrun!
This is Bravo Platoon. Sergeant, would you kindly get off your ass and save ours?
This is Bravo Platoon. Get over here, man!
I'm too pretty to go like this!
This is Spartan 92 at Charlie Platoon. They're hammering our postion.
Sergeant Forge, this is Charlie. We can't take much more of this.
Dig in men - this is our last stand.
All clear! Evac flight, start your run.
This is Red Team. We're staying dirtside to give you a hand, Sergeant.
Maybe we should get some turrets up?
Hey, thanks for that, Sergeant. Need a Grizzly?
Aerial hostiles on an intercept course! Evac flight, abort! Repeat, Evac flight, abort, abort!
This is Alpha Platoon. We're on our way. Save us a seat!
This is Bravo Platoon. We can hoof it, if we have to.
This is Charlie Platoon, we'll come in on our own. Keep those engines hot.
Captain, those pylons down there are generating the field we're in.
Way ahead of you, sir. Forge, I'm sending you a new toy. A Gremlin. Drive it over to that pylon.
Forge, I'm sending you a new toy. A Gremlin. Drive it over to that pylon.
Recalculating speed of descent... carry the 4... and... we... might just make it!
Sergeant, we're running out of time. Use the Gremlin, Sergeant - I didn't send it down there for my amusement.
Pylon sighted. Marking on your display.
All ground forces present and accounted for, Captain.
Good work. Serina, final evac from planet surface inbound. Prep airlocks.
Damnit. I didn't come all this way to lose the professor.
Captain, the area is locked down. Anders done with her skull session?
The professor's filled me in. Good work, Sergeant. Stand by for mission briefing.
Pathetic fools. You do not even realize that you are all dead.
I think he's scared of us.
Oh no! That thing followed me!
I am the Arbiter - I am your death!
Well, lookee there - I wonder if the keys are still in it.
The Covenant really shouldn't leave their toys lying around.
Bah, looks like we need another Elephant. We need to get this thing up those ramps.
Elephants lost. Get another one to replace it
That's the wreckage from the Prophecy. All hands lost.
Those sneaky little...they're locking us out of Alpha with that barrier.
More Marines. Good. We need to get the barrier down and clean out Alpha.
Bring the Warthogs up into the fight.
Finally, the rescue party's here! Ooh-rah!
This is Tango Three Three. We're under heavy fire!
That turret is chewing us up!
Thought we were dead for sure. Ooh-rah!
Tango One Four, you need to get us outta here!
We were the first out sir.
Yessir. We just got pushed back hard.
Eww! We got Grunt bits all in the grill!
Time for some payback. Run 'em over!
We're getting torn up pretty bad.
Mayday! Titan Two One One in need of assistance. Over!
Follow us, Marines. We'll get you through.
Well now, that was the most fun I've had all week.
Spirit of Fire, this is Forge. Area clear. Situation normal. Orders?
Barrier's down! Let's do this, gentlemen! Open fire!
Warthogs can't get through but footsoldiers can. Get this thing down and we'll come a-runnin'.
Get through that barrier and blow its power source. It should just be on the other side.
Fall in behind me. We're taking Alpha back!
We don't get to those guys quick, there's gonna be nothin' to save.
Distress flare just ahead. Don't worry, ladies, the cavalry is here!
Alpha must be pretty messed up. More survivors ahead.
Hang on, Marine - we're on our way!
Roger that. We'll round up any and all survivors and get Alpha back.
Captain, Alpha is toast. Nothing for me to pull back to. Suggest you hold that backup for now.
Damnit! Forge is down! Fall back. We need to retake Alpha Base. Regroup and try this again.
Alpha Base is ours again. Sergeant Forge, you may want to scout the area.
We need to turn that around, Sergeant. Serina, what's our status?
Well, look at that. They're trying to keep us out of our own base.
Sir, we've got a lot of troops retreating from Alpha Base. If Sergeant Forge can regroup them, our numbers may be sufficient to retake the base.
Good job. We successfully evacuated some civilians from Arcadia.
Press $$A$$ over the unit you want to repair, then press $$A$$.
Patrol here. We've got those civilians pretty well directed to the ships.
Transport 3! What are you doing! Do not EVAC. Repeat, do not EVAC!
Evacuation proceeding. Make sure civilian security level 4 and above are priority.
Red Team. Point two four, one one seven tango ground operation beta advise.
Spirit of Fire, Forge here. Please advise on evacuation plan.
T minus 5,4,3,2, LAUNCH. All systems green. Clearing launch platform. Good luck down there.
I've marked some locations suitable for base deployment. Make sure the area is clear!
Spirit of Fire, this is Arcadian Patrol, civilians entering the city are getting blocked by hostile forces. We need to clear that area, can you assist?
Cargo THREE. I gotta get this bird in the air soon! We're dead down here!
We're going to have to utilize existing ground assets for the civilian evacuation. Those ships are completely defenseless and we're the only protection they'll have.
The transports are away. Sergeant Forge, pull back and regroup. New orders are incoming.
The transport ships have been destroyed. We need to restart this operation.
Congratulations. We were able to evacuate a great many innocent civilians from Arcadia.
Our ground forces have been completely neutralized. We'll need to restart this mission.
We've got the evacuation under control, but we can't take on the Covenant!
This is Patrol. These civilians know where to go; all you have to do is make sure they get there alive.
We're hit! We're hit! Somebody help! Plea...
Cargo THREE. Under fire - screw the EVAC! Proceeding with emergency launch!
Cargo TWO is under enemy attack. Don't leave us out here to die!
Cargo ONE is taking heavy fire. Requesting assistance.
Cargo transport sealing bulkheads, firing retros, we're GONE.
This is Ground Control - Covenant are closing in, prepare emergency launch protocols. Mark.
I'm glad you were there to back us up. You've saved innocent lives.
Cargo THREE. We are all alone out here. Can't you guys hurry up?
Cargo TWO. Reporting hits of small arms fire on the hull!
Cargo ONE. We are taking fire!
Spirit of Fire, Red Team. The Covenant are gaining control of the city fast. Suggest setting up new ground operations.
Red Team here. We'll cover the transports. Just get those civilians up here!
We're not here to be nice to these people - we're here to save them. Move it!
Dammit! Cargo ONE and TWO, do not disembark. All UNSC protect those transports.
We're going to lose that front line! We need reinforcements from the base! NOW!
Arcadia Ground Control, this is Forge. We're inbound to aid in evacuation efforts. Help is on the way!
Just try to get as many to the ships alive as possible.
Transport 3! What are you doing! Those people! You can't leave yet!
Covenant battle net chatter suggests Heavy Turrets are coming online.
Spirit, Forge here. I agree - we got room to get a base up and running?
Once the core reaches a flat area, it will no longer be in danger of rolling back down the hill. Get the core to level ground...and do try to avoid any unnecessary jostling.
If that Elephant gets destroyed on the ramp, the core will roll all the way back down. It's not going to be pretty.
Towing unit is lost! Reactor is rolling back down! Watch your toes!
Clear the way! FTL is cut free and sliding back!
I don't want to take any more chances flying that core in. We're changing this to a ground operation.
The FTL core has ruptured and is going critical. We've failed.
Sergeant, engineers are on their way to rig the core. We're nearly there.
The core is a heavy son-of-a-bitch. Use Elephants to drag it up those ramps. They're the only vehicle with enough torque to pull that damn thing.
All right, let's hitch the Elephant up to the FTL core and go from there.
Spirit, we have reached the target site. Orders?
... This is Victor 397! Stabilizers out! We can't carry her! Going down! Clear the area, we are dropping cargo!
Bring All Three Elephants Back to Base
Lock Down Elephant to Train Troops $$Y$$
INDIA reporting location overrun with hostiles...we...
Clear out that crap around the Elephant. We need to get it mobile.
Where were you guys like ten minutes ago?
Spirit! This is INDIA! They've ...they've taken over...get us... aahhhHhh!!
INDIA, reporting in. Elephants unpacking. Hold for... Wait... Over there...
Are we glad to see you! We were overrun by...something. It was horrible.
Spirit of Fire, Recon Teams ECHO and INDIA are clear of hostiles and moving to potential base sites. Over.
One of them bit me then ran off! Is that bad?
ECHO here, we've got a slight malfunction in our...Somethings gotten into...
Get them off! Get them off me!
I don't like this. I hear funny things out there! Funny things!
ECHO is operational. Situation normal. All is...hold on...something's...
ECHO reporting..Everythin..Wait..What was that...Just over the rock line...
Are...you one of them? Thank God!
This is ECHO! Help! Help! They've breached our - aahhhHhh!!
Serina - I thought you said there weren't any signs of the Covenant down here. What do you call all this?
Yeah, yeah, yeah. Always a bridesmaid, never a bride.
All right, let's get everyone back to the base. Move. Move. Move!
Serina, you ever hear the phrase "too much information?"
Not Covenant, sir - something else, something worse. Much uglier.
Hostiles clear. Let's move - it's getting darker out here.
You're clear - let's get you home.
Forge here! I believe Teams Echo and India are compromised. Over.
Thanks, Serina. Seems as good a place as any. Let's get this thing up and running.
Our beacon is just up ahead. Should be easy going now.
Spirit, any closer on that transponder location?
Keep the enemy off those Elephants! We need them operational!
Covenant? I'm not reading any Brute signatures.
We can't lose any of those Elephants - we need all of them intact.
Keep an eye on that Elephant , Sergeant. You lose that, we lose our foothold.
Sergeant, I'm approving your beacon for a fire base site. Serina, prep pods for launch.
Roger that. Sergeant Forge, you will need to clear that fire line just ahead of your location and get to your beacon. We'll follow up at that time.
Sergeant, take a team out there and find out what's happening.
We need those units intact. Bring all Elephants back to base, Sergeant!
Sergeant, logistics are preventing reinforcements. Train squads out of that Elephant.
All Elephants are home. Hold for new orders.
We lost an Elephant. We need all Elephants intact to continue on. Regroup.
I wouldn't recommend getting too close to those things. You won't like what happens next.
Designation "Jiralhanae," a.k.a. Brutes, responsible for the attack on Harvest.
Elephant getting pounded on! Get some backup on it!
Our database has nothing on their origins - or, well, anything about them, really.
At first glance, they appear to be a species of virulent, parasitic organisms that thrive by consuming other sentient life of sufficient biomass.
Well, that's new. And scary. These organisms are... interesting.
Signal flares. We must be close.
Uhh, Sergeant. What's happening to them? What are they doing? They're attacking us!
Optional: Train squads out of Elephant
INDIA signs are offline as well. How very ominous.
ECHO signs are offline - quite suddenly I might add.
Aye aye sir. Location marked and pods launched. Don't do it wrong, boys.
Base, I can hold 'em off for now, but not forever. I need those reinforcements!
Base, this is Forge. We're under heavy fire...
Base, reinforcements are here. Clear the area so I can move Anders safely.
Base, I need covering fire over here!
Forge here. Cover us - I'm getting Anders out of here.
We're pinned down near the back of the structure!
Hold them off while Anders rests for a moment.
I won't move Anders until the area is cleared of enemy units!
All right, we're moving - cover us!
I've got men down - where are those reinforcements?
Base? Can I get a little help here?
Forge here...we made it! Ready for extraction!
This is Forge. We're pinned down inside the Artifact. Anders is hurt...need assistance.....
This is Forge. It's over - I've lost Anders...
We're taking too much enemy fire, you've got to keep them busy.
They've cut us off! The bridge is down!
We're doubling back to the other bridge!
Covenant units are breaking though entrances we thought were sealed. Keep an eye on those doors in there.
This is Cutter. Get some men in there and reinforce Forge's position! Get Anders out of there!
Hunters are heavily armored. Get that Scorpion in there and help Forge take 'em down.
The Covenant have surprised us and counterattacked, trapping Forge and Anders inside the relic. Get in there and escort them out.
A Pelican is standing by to evac Forge and Anders once they reach the relic entrance.
The Covenant are right on our ass! Keep moving!
That Covenant artillery is getting awfully close...
Get to that crater. Do not engage the enemy behind us! Keep moving!
We only have a little time to prep the base for the Covenant attacks. Let's get to it!
Clear the enemy out of this crater!
The Command Center is under attack! Defend it!
Let's see what these Spartans can do. Push the Covenant back!
Covenant Mega Turret! We've got to take it out somehow!
I've scanned the area. The best defendable location is an impact crater a few clicks south along the highway.
Spartan Team Omega is prepped and ready. Pelican is en route.
We're dropping a Command Center in that crater for you.
I've contacted other UNSC forces in the area and informed them to retreat to your position.
Help is coming. Trust me, you won't be disappointed.
They're not very happy with us after helping those civilians escape.
Watch for enemy ambushes along the highway. Radio chatter indicates they know you're coming.
We cannot lose our foothold on Arcadia, gentlemen! Secure a defendable position and hold it until we can reinforce you.
Hold that crater at all costs!
Help is on the way, do not lose that Command Center.
Ha! You are rushing too. This will be brutal.
Nice turrets, but what happens if I walk around them.
I guess you listened to my warning... I may have to suprise you next time.
I told you I would rush. You should have built some dudes sooner.
You built some defenses. Let's find out if they were enough.
Scans seem clear. Shall we see what's inside?
Looks like we only shook the beehive. We've got multiple bogies incoming!
Serina is detecting a lot of activity in the Dome. Get some Turrets up on this base ASAP.
Press $$A$$ on an open building site then press $$A$$ while over the Reactor.
Data from the shelling proves we're on the right track, but we need to simultaneously launch from multiple Rhinos.
Use $$Y$$ to lock down a Rhino
The Rhino has arrived! Get it to the position 1.
Remember, you can request more Rhinos from the landing pad.
I'll take control of that Rhino to calibrate the shots.
I've marked the second position. Request another Rhino and get it to that site.
We should take out those Covenant buildings that are reinforcing their position.
The area is secure - get a Rhino in place!
Rhinos are in position and ready to fire! Firing Rhinos in 3...2...1!
Not much effect, but it looks like we're making some progress!
We've got a lot more Dropships approaching!
We're going to need a transport to get the Rhino to that position.
Hmmm. My calculations show that two more Rhinos will be necessary to open a hole big enough. The final two positions have been marked.
I've marked the forth and fifth postions.
The Covenant must have figured out what we are doing. We're going to need a larger force to take those locations!
Cross your fingers! Firing all Rhinos in 3...2...1!
All right! The dome generators and air defenses are the main targets. Light 'em up!
Rhino was lost - get one back in position.
Spirit of Fire, this is Red Team. We are 100 meters from Ander's transponder signal...meeting strong resistance. Seeing some pretty crazy stuff out here. Over.
Hold your position Red Team. Reinforcements will come to you.
Take out more colonies quickly - the first one is starting to regenerate!
Spirit of Fire, getting a little hairy here, sir. Where's that backup?
I've received Red Team's coordinates. I've marked it on your map.
Not sure what just happened, but the large one just shook like it was hurt.
We are almost close enough to place the explosive!
One of the colonies has regenerated and the large creature has gained strength.
All right! All the creatures are dying!
They've destroyed another airlock. Don't let the enemy take them all out!
Optional: Keep at Least One Deck Gun Alive
Captain, if we shoot down the transport ships before they drop off their troops it will slow them down.
Cyclops can be tasked onto the power core to repair it. The more on the job, the faster the repair.
The power core is nearly destroyed!
They've taken a bite out of our repair efforts. Fight them off!
Our power core has been repaired about halfway.
Captain, we need damage control or the Spirit of Fire is going down.
Optional: Prevent Any Airlock from Being Destroyed
Captain, they're transporting invasion forces onto the hull.
The Spirit's power core is almost repaired.
They're attacking with both aircraft and ground troops. We should upgrade our turrets to counter appropriately.
The power core is destroyed; we've lost the ship. Serina, begin emergency evacuation sequence.
The power core is fully repaired. Serina, best speed away.
Forge, use Cyclopses to repair the power core while you defend against Covenant attacks!
Optional: Destroy all enemy power nodes
It can't fire in two directions at once; maybe we can use that to our advantage.
The Scarab is about half dead, or half alive. Take your pick.
The temple ruins in this area will provide some cover, but not forever.
The Scarab's searchlight beam shows the direction it's facing.
Build up a base and army, and go kill that Scarab.
The Scarab's head is moving even slower now - keep it up.
The head is tracking more slowly.
Your Command Center has been destroyed. You have failed.
The Scarab is destroyed. Victory is ours today.
You've advanced to where the forcefield stood. Take a look around.
If that thing burns through that barrier of ruins and destroys our Command Center, we're dead.
You've destroyed a power node. The Scarab's head is turning a little more slowly.
Destroy those Locusts wherever you find them - they're building-killers.
The Scarab is incomplete but its head is operational. Its field of fire prevents any chance of retreat or extraction - you'll have to destroy it.
The Scarab's weapon system is relying on the power nodes in this area. Destroy them to reduce the Scarab's combat effectiveness.
Activate the second door across from this one.
One set of doors is open. Open the remaining two pairs of doors.
One pair of doors remain. Open them to free Spirit of Fire.
If we don't get that door open before the sun goes critical we're dead.
Use the nodes at the edge of the door to reactivate them.
There must be some pattern to opening the doors.
The Forerunner lettering seems to be paired across two door sections. Maybe that's the key...
One set down, two more to go.
It seems you can activate only one pair of doors at a time
The Sentinels are attracted to the activated nodes. You're going to have to work quickly
It seems the Sentinels are more worried about the Flood than us. Get them to fight each other and we may buy ourselves some time.
The planet is tearing itself apart - keep an eye out for debris.
Good work! We may survive this after all...
The Sentinel A.I. is shutting the doors; it has enacted a planetwide alarm of some kind. The whole planet is locking down!
The Sentinels seem to be combining into larger forms. If this continues they may become unstoppable.
Flood infections detected near you area.
Debris is falling your way - look out!
What are they doing? They're combining!
Get that door open - we only have one shot at this!
We won't be able to send any supplies this time. Requisition as much of an army as you can muster and get the door open.
You don't have much time left - get those last doors open!
Ah perfect - there's a stinkin' Covenant Outpost right where you marked. We better take that out first.
Forge, get out there and get those things off my ship!
Sentinel drones, attacking from the front!
Serina, report. What's going on here?
You can requisition troops from the airlocks on the deck. If we lose those airlocks we'll be defenseless.
The drones are leaving. Serina, what's going on here?
Take that thing out. We've got to get the ship out of here
If we lose all the airlocks, we'll lose the ship.
Best guess? We're being pulled through some sort of docking system.
That alien life form has followed us in. We have a significant infestation on the aft quarter.
Those aliens are dropping pods on the hull from all around us - keep watch for them.
Alien population on the hull is increasing and the structure is reacting...more of those drones inbound too.
I'm detecting some sort of alarm from the planet's A.I. Something's coming.
Flood levels are rising. I'm also picking up high energy readings...coming from the tunnel.
Sergeant Forge, get your men into the airlocks. Something very bad is coming.
A large enemy object is approaching. Scans indicate a drone variant. It's blocking the exit.
The ring is coming again! Take cover!
No problem. I told you we'd make it.
Security barrier breached. High-order infection detected. Unidentified alien intrusion detected. Initiating Stage 3 defense protocols.
High order infection approaching sector zero. Inner biosphere threat. Possible Reclaimer signature, undetermined. Deploying Stage 3 Enforcer.
At Least One Airlock Must Survive
Release te ship from the docking clamp.
Welcome to the Halo Wars Alpha Tutorial!
We're currently looking at your base. This is where you will train and upgrade your armies. More about that later...
In the center of your screen you'll see the CROSSHAIR. Let's learn how to move it. Use the LEFT STICK $$LS$$ to move the CROSSHAIR over the flashing beacon.
Use the LEFT STICK $$LS$$ to move the CROSSHAIR to the next beacon. The orange OBJECTIVE ARROW near the CROSSHAIR tells you which direction to go.
Tell my wife I lov-- blearghrrgggrrrrrr!
Clean the Flood off the Hull
I am still trying to confirm Professor Anders' coordinates...a watched pot and all that.
Garrison your Squads into the Airlocks to Protect Them

Construction vehicle capable of constructing a new base. Note: vehicle is consumed in the process.
